Message.En:
<COL ffdc78>(Enemy appears at night)</COL>
Defeat the enemies encountered
Message.Jp:
<COL ffdc78>【 敵出現：夜 】</COL>
遭遇した敵を討伐する

Message.En:
In the <NAME AREA>, 
it seems that the residents are being threatened 
by a dangerous presence that appears at night.
Message.Jp:
<NAME AREA>では、夜になると現れる
危険な存在により住民が脅かされているらしい

Message.En:
<COL ffdc78>【Enemy appears during：Night】</COL>
My comrade still wanders the battlefield
to this day. 
I need to get him back to our homeland
as soon as possible. 
Tonight, I'll be out searching for him again.
If anyone sees him, let me know immediately.
Message.Jp:
<COL ffdc78>【 敵出現：夜 】</COL>
俺の戦友は、今でもあの戦場を彷徨っている
一日でも早く、俺は奴を故郷に
連れて帰ってやらにゃぁならん
また今晩も、俺は奴を捜しにいくよ
誰か奴を見かけたら、すぐに俺に知らせてくれ
遭遇した敵を討伐する
